column1: Me while watching an old episode of the kardashians:the mavericks weren’t playing when they kicked Lamar Odom off the team.
My sister lauraparra18: wow I think Kim Kardashians marriage lasted longer than Lamar playing for the mav’s
I feel so terrible with bad cramps and and feeling sick I’m just binge watching keeping up with the kardashins
JUST CUT THE DAMN PONYTAIL OFF BRUCE!!
Keeping Up With The Kardashians is on Netflix and I’m going to do the thing.
